module.description: Plots an Ragraph object to a PNG file using the gridGraphviz package

source.script: library(gridGraphviz) png("example.png") grid.graph(Ragraph, newpage=TRUE) dev.off()]]? </script> </source> <output name="example.png"> <file ref="example.png"/> <format formatType="text">PNG image file</format> </output> </module>
